name: Dynamic Graphs
description:
Survey on dynamic graph visualizations by Beck et al.

Beck, Fabian, et al. "A taxonomy and survey of dynamic graph visualization." Computer graphics forum. Vol. 36. No. 1. 2017.

https://doi.org/10.1111/cgf.12791
http://dynamicgraphs.fbeck.com/

name: ICLR Reviews
description:
ICLR Reviews from the PeerRead dataset at https://github.com/allenai/PeerRead

Kang, Dongyeop, et al. "A dataset of peer reviews (PeerRead): Collection, insights and NLP applications." arXiv preprint arXiv:1804.09635 (2018).
